name: P11
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated wide-angle camera mounted on garage, suburban home driveway and front yard at night. Single porch light provides harsh overhead illumination with deep shadows. A person in dark hoodie with hood pulled up, face obscured by hood, average build, moving with deliberate slow pace. They methodically check the front door, peer in windows, then walk to check the garage door. Fixed camera position, wide field of view covering driveway and street approach, slight barrel distortion at edges, IR-tinted footage quality typical of home security systems, slight grain. Realistic human motion, 20-second duration.
